data.title: Burnout Video Games
data.meta_description: Explore Burnout video games from Electronic Arts, a leading publisher of games for the PC, consoles and mobile.
data.text: The first name in racing game carnage, Burnout takes the arcade-fueled action of high-flying stunts and crashes and shifts it into high gear. Smash through the streets and watch every detail of your crashes come to life in spectacular slow-mo. Wreck the competition in Burnout Paradise, winner of GameSpotâ€™s Best Driving Game award of 2008. Enjoy high-octane stunts and wanton destruction in one of the greatest arcade-driving game series ever
